name: Return to "Home" screen after successful data sharing
scenarioId: ios/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/Present_document_in_person_Redesign_110/presentDocumentInPerson:Return to "Home" screen after successful data sharing
methodName: Return to "Home" screen after successful data sharing

testSteps.description: Given the wallet displays the success screen with details about the data shared
When the user selects the Close button
Then the user is redirected to the Home screen

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to be able to present attestations from my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can authenticate, authorise transactions and present personal information upon requests of a Relying Party in proximity scenarios

title: Return to "Home" screen after successful data sharing
